title: salvatores-iphoto 11 custom package
description:
iPhoto Ã¢â‚¬â„¢11 gets a new look with stunning full-screen views for Events, Faces, Places, and Albums that let you take advantage of every inch of your Mac display. iPhoto also offers new ways to share and showcase your photos. You can upload your photos to your Facebook Wall and even view friendsÃ¢â‚¬Ëœ comments right in iPhoto. Turn your email into something really special with ten Apple-designed photo mail templates. iPhoto '11 works with iCloud, so the photos you take on your iOS devices automatically appear in iPhoto, and photos you import into iPhoto automatically appear on your iOS devices. Add movement and music to your photos with one of 12 dynamic slideshow themes. iPhoto Ã¢â‚¬â„¢11 introduces a new way to create professional-quality photo books quickly and easily. And new letterpress cards let you combine your photos and text with elegant imprinted designs.

New full-screen modes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Events automatically organizes photos based on when you took them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Faces uses face detection and recognition to organize photos by people
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Places displays your photos on an interactive map
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Albums organizes your favorite pictures in iPad-style photo stacks 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Bookshelf displays all your book, card, and calendar projects

Facebook enhancements
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Albums view displays all your Facebook photo albums
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ View friendsÃ¢â‚¬Ëœ photo comments right in iPhoto
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Post to existing Facebook photo albums and to your Wall with a comment
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Facebook sharing history
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for multiple accounts

Emailing photos
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ten Apple-designed themes, including Announcement, Cardstock, and Postcard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for all popular mail services
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Attach photos with one click

New slideshows
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Six new themes (12 total), including Holiday Mobile, Reflections, and Places

Big leap in photo books
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dynamic, carousel-based theme browser

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ã¢â‚¬Å“BirdÃ¢â‚¬Ëœs-eyeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ All Pages view

Letterpress cards
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautiful, debossed designs imprinted on premium paper
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 27 themes complete with matching envelopes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Personalize with your photos and text

Photo Stream
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ See recent photos taken on your iOS devices without having to import or sync
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically import Photo Stream photos into your iPhoto library

Aperture compatibility
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New unified photo library for both iPhoto and Aperture (v 3.3 or later ) with no import/export required
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Events, Faces, Places, albums and web sharing work across both applications

iPhoto print products are available in the U.S., Canada, Japan, and select countries in Europe and Asia Pacific.

Some features and third-party services require Internet access and iCloud; additional fees and terms may apply. iCloud is available to persons age 13 or older. 

Third-party services may not be available in all languages or in all countries. Use of these services requires Internet access and may require you to accept additional terms.
